title: Lotus roots and spare ribs soup

ingredients.ingredient: chinese yam 淮山, sliced and soaked in salty water

steps: Marinate the pork ribs with salt for at least 6 hours.
Blanch the pork ribs to remove the gunk. Rinse and set aside.
At medium high heat, add oil and garlic cloves and fry for a minute
Add lotus root and carrot and fry for about 3 minutes.
Add hot water, spring onions, date palms and let boil for 10 minutes.
At low heat, continue to boil for another 20 minutes.
Add spare ribs in and cook for 40 mins.
Rinse the salt water off the yam, add into the soup for another 20 minutes.
